tool.name: qiime2 diversity alpha-phylogenetic

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency | PresenceAbsence]
param.help: [required] The feature table containing the samples for which alpha diversity should be computed.

param.name: phylogeny
param.label: phylogeny: Phylogeny[Rooted]
param.help: [required] Phylogenetic tree containing tip identifiers that correspond to the feature identifiers in the table. This tree can contain tip ids that are not present in the table, but all feature ids in the table must be present in this tree.

param.name: metric
param.label: metric: Str % Choices('faith_pd')
param.help: [required] The alpha diversity metric to be computed.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity alpha-phylogenetic ===================================== Alpha diversity (phylogenetic)
Outputs: -------- :alpha_diversity.qza: Vector containing per-sample alpha diversities.
|
Description: ------------ Computes a user-specified phylogenetic alpha diversity metric for all samples in a feature table.
|
